hero.subtitle: Ensure workplace safety and compliance with our comprehensive DOT drug testing services. We offer reliable and efficient testing solutions tailored to meet your specific needs.

box1.title: Schedule Your Test Today
box1.description: Book DOT-compliant drug and alcohol testing with ease. Fast appointments, certified labs, and nationwide coverage.

box2.title: Fast & Reliable Drug Testing
box2.label: Tests Completed
box2.subtitle: Thousands of DOT and Non-DOT tests successfully conducted every month with speed, accuracy, and full compliance.

box4.title: Certified & Reliable Results
box4.subtitle: All tests are conducted by SAMHSA-certified labs and reviewed by qualified Medical Review Officers (MROs).

box6.title: Trusted by
box6.subtitle: Partnering with thousands of
box6.subtitle3: businesses nationwide to ensure safety and legal compliance.

heading.title: Our Testing Process
heading.subtitle: Simple. Fast. Compliant.
heading.description: We make DOT testing hassle-free with nationwide coverage and certified accuracy.

card1.title: Register & Order a Test
card1.description: Create an account with us and easily order a DOT drug test for your drivers or employees.

card2.title: Certified Sample Collection
card2.description: All collections are performed by trained professionals following strict DOT guidelines to ensure accuracy and confidentiality.

card3.title: Get Accurate Results
card3.description: Lab results are reviewed by a certified Medical Review Officer (MRO) and delivered quickly to keep your business compliant.

card1.title: For Employers
card1.description: End-to-end compliance solutions including pre-employment screening, random drug testing program management, supervisor training, and DOT documentation support.

card2.title: For Truck Drivers
card2.description: Fast and convenient DOT and non-DOT testing with secure online results, enrollment certificates, and FMCSA Clearinghouse assistance to stay compliant.

card3.title: For Fleets & Owner-Operators
card3.description: Nationwide consortium programs, 24/7 post-accident collections, custom test panels, and audit-ready reporting designed to keep your fleet safe and compliant.

top.heading: Backed by Certified Labs & Nationwide Network
top.paragraph: We partner with SAMHSA-certified laboratories, professional collectors, and FMCSA Clearinghouse specialists to deliver fast, accurate, and compliant drug & alcohol testing services across the country.

card1.title: Nationwide Collection Network
card1.description: Access over 20,000 certified collection sites with 24/7 post-accident and onsite testing options for maximum convenience and coverage.

card2.title: Comprehensive Compliance Support
card2.description: From pre-employment screening to random program management and audit readiness, we provide full DOT and non-DOT compliance support for employers and drivers.

bottom.heading: Ensuring Safety, Compliance & Peace of Mind
bottom.paragraph: Empowering employers, drivers, and fleets with secure testing solutions, real-time results, and end-to-end compliance management nationwide.

card1.title: Certified Drug & Alcohol Testing
card1.desc: DOT and non-DOT panels, breath alcohol testing, return-to-duty programs, and Medical Review Officer (MRO) certified results.

card2.title: FMCSA Clearinghouse Assistance
card2.desc: One-on-one registration guidance, query support for new hires, violation reporting, and annual compliance management.

card3.title: Random Testing Program Management
card3.desc: Full consortium and pool management with secure reporting, electronic chain-of-custody forms (eCCF), and audit-ready documentation.

card4.title: Onsite & Emergency Collections
card4.desc: Mobile and after-hours collections available for post-accident, reasonable suspicion, and remote job site testing needs.

results.heading: Trusted Nationwide Drug & Alcohol Testing
results.paragraph: Register today and access fast, reliable, and DOT-compliant testing solutions. From pre-employment to random and post-accident testing, we keep your workforce safe and compliant.
results.description: Thousands of employers, drivers, and fleet operators rely on NDC for certified testing, FMCSA Clearinghouse support, and comprehensive compliance management across all industries.

card1.title: Real-Time Test Results
card1.desc: Employers and drivers receive fast, secure, and confidential drug & alcohol test results reviewed by certified Medical Review Officers (MROs).

card2.title: Nationwide Collection Network
card2.desc: With over 20,000 certified locations and mobile units, we make DOT and non-DOT testing accessible anytime, anywhere.

card3.title: Complete Compliance Management
card3.desc: From FMCSA Clearinghouse support to random testing pools and recordkeeping, we provide full compliance solutions for employers and fleets.

card4.title: Ensuring Safer Workplaces
card4.desc: Our mission is to help businesses maintain safe, drug-free environments while staying fully compliant with DOT and state regulations.

card1.quote: The registration process was quick and we had our drivers tested the same day. Results came back fast and secure.
card1.name: Sarah P.

card2.quote: Their random testing program and Clearinghouse support saved us so much time. Compliance has never been this easy.
card2.name: Michael R.

card3.quote: 24/7 post-accident testing gave us peace of mind. Having a reliable partner like NDC keeps our company audit-ready.
card3.name: David L.
